original_text: During the third year that he ruled, he gave a big feast for his leaders and officers. The soldiers from the army of Persia and Media came to the feast. The rulers and leaders of the regions in the kingdom also came.
korean_text: 왕위에 있은 지 제삼년에 그의 모든 지방관과 신하들을 위하여 잔치를 베푸니 바사와 메대의 장수와 각 지방의 귀족과 지방관들이 다 왕 앞에 있는지라

sentences.original_text: During the third year that he ruled
he gave a big feast for his leaders and officers
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 지도자들과 관리들을 위해 큰 잔치를 베풀었습니다

sentences.original_text: The soldiers from the army of Persia and Media
The rulers and leaders of the regions in the kingdom
